text.div:
GlobalStatementValues

The set of values for the statement about the absence or exclusion.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/global-statement-values defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
01 None knownNo information about taking any medication is known.
02 Not askedNo information about taking any medication is available because the patient was not asked or not able to be asked.
03 None suppliedNo information about taking any medication is supplied.

name: GlobalStatementValues
description: The set of values for the statement about the absence or exclusion.

concept.definition: No information about taking any medication is known.
No information about taking any medication is available because the patient was not asked or not able to be asked.
No information about taking any medication is supplied.
